name: Guahan Flicker Widget
author: Garth Henson

sections.description:
This plugin uses the Flickr RESTful API to retrieve the specified number of images for the specified user for display in
the sidebar of your WordPress blog. The display of the widget is customizable by defining the title as well as the number
of rows and the number of images per row.
sections.installation:
1. Upload guahanFlickr.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the widget through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your side bar and set your title and Flickr username from the ‘Widgets’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This widget will allow you to display your newest Flickr images easily in your sidebar.
description:
This plugin uses the Flickr RESTful API to retrieve the specified number of images for the specified user for display in
